BList.h File Reference

Brief
Contains declarations for the BList class, which is a double-linked list
containing multiple elements within the list.
Also BListException and BListStats.

BListException
Enums
BList_Exception => Exceptions for the BList
Functions
code => Returns the exception code
what => Returns information about the throw

BListStats
Variables
NodeSize => The size of each node
NodeCount => The number of nodes in the list
ArraySize => The max number of items in each node
ItemCount => The total number of items

BList
Subclasses
BNode => A linked list node for the BList
STATIC FUNCTIONS
nodesize() => Returns the size of a node
PUBLIC FUNCTIONS
operator=(const BList&) => Copy Assignment
push_back(const T&) => Pushes the value into the back
push_front(const T&) => Pushes the value into the front
insert(const T&) => Inserts the element at sorted pos
remove(int) => Removes element at index
remove_by_value(const T&) => Removes element with value
find(const T&) => Returns index of element with value
operator[](int) => Returns element at index
size() => Returns amount of elems
clear() => Clears entire list
GetHead() => Returns the head of the list
GetStats() => Returns the stats
PRIVATE FUNCTIONS
(Node functions)
[p]_CreateNode(BNode*, BNode*) => Creates a new node between
[p]_DeleteNode(BNode*) => Deletes the node
[p]_SplitNode(BNode*) => Splits node into 2
(Element functions)
[p]_InsertIntoNode(BNode*,size_t,const T&) => Inserts elem into node
[p]_RemoveFromNode(BNode*, size_t) => Removes elem at index from node
(Searching functions)
[p]_LinearSearch(BNode*, const T&) => Linear search for elem in node
[p]_BinarySearch(BNode*, const T&) => Binary search for elem in node
[p]_FindInNode(BNode*, const T&) => Search for elem in node
Specific portions that gave you the most trouble: Making insert work properly. More...

#include <string>
#include <stdexcept>

Detailed Description

Brief
Contains declarations for the BList class, which is a double-linked list
containing multiple elements within the list.
Also BListException and BListStats.

BListException
Enums
BList_Exception => Exceptions for the BList
Functions
code => Returns the exception code
what => Returns information about the throw

BListStats
Variables
NodeSize => The size of each node
NodeCount => The number of nodes in the list
ArraySize => The max number of items in each node
ItemCount => The total number of items

BList
Subclasses
BNode => A linked list node for the BList
STATIC FUNCTIONS
nodesize() => Returns the size of a node
PUBLIC FUNCTIONS
operator=(const BList&) => Copy Assignment
push_back(const T&) => Pushes the value into the back
push_front(const T&) => Pushes the value into the front
insert(const T&) => Inserts the element at sorted pos
remove(int) => Removes element at index
remove_by_value(const T&) => Removes element with value
find(const T&) => Returns index of element with value
operator[](int) => Returns element at index
size() => Returns amount of elems
clear() => Clears entire list
GetHead() => Returns the head of the list
GetStats() => Returns the stats
PRIVATE FUNCTIONS

[p]_DeleteNode(BNode*) => Deletes the node
[p]_SplitNode(BNode*) => Splits node into 2
(Element functions)

(Searching functions)
